name: Night Patrol (Walschaerts)
description:
Night Patrol is the follow-up to Gas Light, in which you are a night watch patrolman who has to complete routine.

This is a bizarre murder incident involving many shady stories. Later chapters will fully describe all the incidents, and this time you will become the protagonist to understand the process of all this.

In the process, you learn some information from the conversations of others.

The story after that will continue in future games. 

In-game particle effects can be turned off in OPTION, but your changes will not be saved.

In the game you need to complete a few mission, just get close to the point and press " F ".
